attributes.action: It should be made illegal to sell alcohol or intoxicating substances to adults with "severe learning disabilites"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A girl I once knew at college has recently died after drinking 5 vodkas, she had Down's Syndrome and did not know the difference between alcohol and orange juice. To her they were both the same. She then had seizure which resulted in her having a cardiac arrest. They were unable to stablise her.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
